messages.subject: Update on Saitou family tree
messages.msgSnippet: Newest name deciphered: Tokio s sister, Tami. I read about her ages ago, but had otherwise forgotten about her. Back to work! --M.
messages.messageBody:

had otherwise forgotten about her.

Back to work!

--M.
